Explanation: The bug in the buggy code is that it only replaces the characters with '+' for the first occurrence of the word in the string. It does not handle multiple occurrences of the word in the string. Generated Test cases 1-6 (6/11) should pass the buggy code as they contain only one occurrence of the word. Test cases 7-11 (5/11) should fail the buggy code as they contain multiple occurrences of the word.
test_case_10: "This is a test This is a test", "test"
